utils.timeout_manager module

Timeout Manager - AI PPT Assistant Provides centralized timeout control and monitoring for Lambda functions

基类：BaseModel

Configuration for timeout management

critical_threshold: float
model_config: ClassVar[ConfigDict] = {}

Configuration for the model, should be a dictionary conforming to [ConfigDict][pydantic.config.ConfigDict].

class utils.timeout_manager.TimeoutManager(lambda_context=None, config=None)[源代码]

基类：object

Centralized timeout management for Lambda functions

Features: - Lambda context-aware timeout monitoring - Operation-level timeout control - Early warning system - Graceful shutdown handling - Performance metrics collection
